tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  authorized BOOLEAN,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES biometric_data(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    fingerprint_data BYTEA,
    facial_data BYTEA,
    iris_data BYTEA,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE authorization_log (
    auth_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    authorized BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE BiometricData (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  biometric_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  biometric_data BLOB NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE AuthorizationLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  authorized BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  authorization_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  biometric_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  biometric_data BLOB NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
